name: Sinful Eden
summary: Sinful Eden is a point 'n' click adventure with dating sim and RPG elements. You take on the role of a young man living in Karigon Island, Karigon law states that all males who're of age are duty-bound to marry, failure to comply will result in execution, as ordained by the high priestess Aurora. Unfortunately for you, finding a suitable bride isn't as easy as it sounds... There will be many obstacles in your path to find true love, can you overcome them before it's too late?
